SELECT dw.dwmc FROM yx_pc_jbxx aj INNER JOIN xt_zzjg_dwbm dw ON aj.sxr_dwbm = dw.dwbm WHERE aj.sfsc = 'N'
AND aj.bmsah=#{bmsah}

SELECT gz.gzbm, gz.dwbm, gz.pcflbm, gz.gzmc, gz.sxcx, gz.cxcs, gz.sm, nvl(FGZBM, '-1') fgzbm , ywtx, sfzdy FROM xt_pc_sxgz gz WHERE gz.ywtx = #{ywtx} AND gz.pcflbm = #{pcflbm} AND gz.dwbm = #{dwbm} UNION SELECT '-1' gzbm, #{dwbm} dwbm, #{pcflbm} pcflbm ,'全部' gzmc,'' sxcx ,'' cxcs, '' sm, '0' fgzbm, #{ywtx} ywtx,'N' sfzdy from dual
